es.usc.citius.lab.joctomap.util

Class JOctreeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.usc.citius.lab.joctomap.util.JOctreeUtils

  • public class JOctreeUtils
extends Object
    Contains utilities implemented for the JOctree, but not included in the C/C++ implementation of Octomap.
    Author:
    Adrián González Sieira <adrian.gonzalez@usc.es>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JOctreeUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<Cell> getOccupiedCoordinatesBetween(JOctree octree, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point min, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point max)
      Retrieves a collection with the pairs: size of the occupied cells within a minimum and maximum 3D positions; the low level operations of this method include generate an iterator and check the occupancy of the existing nodes between the given positions.
      static List<JOctreeKey> getOccupiedKeysBetween(JOctree octree, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point min, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point max)
      Retrieves a collection with the keys of the occupied cells within a minimum and maximum 3D positions; the low level operations of this method include generate an iterator and check the occupancy of the existing nodes between the given positions.
      static float resolutionAddedIn(JOctree octree, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point point1, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point point2)
      Queries the resolution between the given points; this is, the resolution at the first point added to the resolution in the second point.
      static float resolutionAt(JOctree octree, es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point point)
      Queries the resolution at a current point of the octree; retrieves Float.MAX_VALUE if the point has not correspondence with a cell in the map.

    • Method Detail

      • getOccupiedKeysBetween

        public static List<JOctreeKey> getOccupiedKeysBetween(JOctree octree,
                                                      es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point min,
                                                      es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point max)
        Retrieves a collection with the keys of the occupied cells within a minimum and maximum 3D positions; the low level operations of this method include generate an iterator and check the occupancy of the existing nodes between the given positions.
        Parameters:
        octree - instance of JOctree
        min - minimum position of the range to check
        max - maximum position of the range to check
        Returns:
        collection of keys of the occupied cells in the range

      • getOccupiedCoordinatesBetween

        public static List<Cell> getOccupiedCoordinatesBetween(JOctree octree,
                                                       es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point min,
                                                       es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point max)
        Retrieves a collection with the pairs: size of the occupied cells within a minimum and maximum 3D positions; the low level operations of this method include generate an iterator and check the occupancy of the existing nodes between the given positions.
        Parameters:
        octree - instance of JOctree
        min - minimum position of the range to check
        max - maximum position of the range to check
        Returns:
        collection of pair(coordinate, size) of the occupied cells in the range

      • resolutionAt

        public static float resolutionAt(JOctree octree,
                                 es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point point)
        Queries the resolution at a current point of the octree; retrieves Float.MAX_VALUE if the point has not correspondence with a cell in the map.
        Parameters:
        octree - instance of JOctree
        point - position to query
        Returns:
        resolution of the cell at the given point, Float.MAX_VALUE if doesn't exist in the map

      • resolutionAddedIn

        public static float resolutionAddedIn(JOctree octree,
                                      es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point point1,
                                      es.usc.citius.lab.motionplanner.core.spatial.Point point2)
        Queries the resolution between the given points; this is, the resolution at the first point added to the resolution in the second point.
        Parameters:
        octree - instance of JOctree
        point1 - position to query
        point2 - position to query
        Returns:
        resolution of the cell at the given point, Float.MAX_VALUE if any point don't exist in the map
